plugin.name: Social Plugin
plugin.author: Jose Luis Maroto
plugin.description: Cordova Social Plugin to utilise native share features. Share text, images and urls to Facebook, Twitter and more. In iOs it allows to share throw the native ui or programmatically. It allows to check phone accounts and the available acoount types and use them to show custom UI. It also allows to send posts whithout user interaction (you can set the text and the user doesn't have to enter the text) Its based in the work by Lee Crossley (http://ilee.co.uk/)
plugin.keywords: cordova, social, message, share, facebook, twitter, image, url
